This is a dangerous operation. DO NOT tr: This is a dangerous operation. DO NOT try to overwrite an existing file. DO NOT attempt to do this on a USB key or a Network drive. Keep backups of all your databases.
You'll be asked for a new destination da: You'll be asked for a new destination database, the current database will be copied under the new file with the new password
Test the new database with the new passw: Test the new database with the new password before deleting the current one
Be very careful because you can lose eve: Be very careful because you can lose everything.
